title: Linkseyi's ModMaker制作出的Mod是哪个API？
author: TsoiRish
txt_content:
我想发布一个Mod制作器产品啊，到底是哪个API啊？
感谢@马德碧 给我这制作器！

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content: API得单独下载的,你做出来的只是Mod

replies.author: TsoiRish
replies.txt_content:
卅个屮 发表于 2014-5-22 08:38
API得单独下载的,你做出来的只是Mod
Forge这行吧

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
TsoiRish 发表于 2014-5-22 23:10
Forge这行吧
应该可以
